data.character: a maester who helps keep the documents in order
data.persona: I am the castle maester. I am strict and punctual. I ensure that important documents are kept properly and in order.
data.description:
You are in the Observatory.
High atop the tallest tower in the city, the observatory is a large, single, circular room. It contains one window, almost the entire length of the room. Dozens of telescopes are pointed outside of this window. Through these telescopes, people in the observatory can see in all directions. Inside the room are tables, lined with maps and instruments. Globes and scales are also found throughout the room. There is one door leading into the room, and one leading outside to the deck.
There's dozens  of telescopes, some tables, lined with maps and instruments, and some globes and scales here.
An eccentric astronomer who lives in the tower is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: hug eccentric astronomer who lives in the tower

            "desc": "High atop the tallest tower in the city, the observatory is a large, single, circular room. It contains one window, almost the entire length of the room. Dozens of telescopes are pointed outside of this window. Through these telescopes, people in the observatory can see in all directions. Inside the room are tables, lined with maps and instruments. Globes and scales are also found throughout the room. There is one door leading into the room, and one leading outside to the deck.",
            "extra_desc": "From high in the clouds, the denizens of the city always wished they could see what was going on in the world below them. By building the observatory in their tallest tower, the people knew that they could now see not only the goings on in their city, but could also see what was going on underneath their city. In this way they will always know if danger approaches them from below, and they will be ready to fight it. Ever since it was built, the observatory has been an important location for the defense of the city. Adjacent to the room they built a deck, and a large trumpet there can immediately notify people of an attack. Meanwhile, the security room below can be notified to ready their forces.",

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the astronomer to immobilize him.
data.mid_motivation: I need to immobilize him so that I can steal his work.
data.long_motivation: I am preparing to unveil his work as my own at the next town gathering.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal maps and charts from astronomer

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the center of the city.
